metadata.title: CVE-2013-4289 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple integer overflows in lib/openjp3d/jp3d.c in OpenJPEG before 1.5.2allow remote attackers to have unspecified impact and vectors, whichtrigger a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
